In childhood I was carefree and cheerful and paid no attention to others' wishes
In adolescence I was often in love and interested in fun and outings and experienced many emotional fluctuations
I have contradictory feelings at one moment - I can cry and laugh simultaneously, be very kind at one moment and cold and merciless the same moment, and I suffer from this duality and don't feel good
Others see me as unbalanced and I also think I have a lot of ups and downs emotionally
Variable states, depression and ecstasy happen to me repeatedly
Sometimes to escape my inner struggles I resort to alcohol and drugs
Music takes me out of myself and I'm completely absorbed and one with it, and I really love dancing
I'm interested in percussion instruments like daf and... and when I hear their sound or play them myself, I'm taken out of myself
I want to free myself from culture and constraints and expectations of family and society, be in control of myself and free and loose and liberated - to me no one in any position can control me
At work I prefer others to specify a task for me and consider enough recreational and rest time for me
I can't think of continuous work or a long-term goal
I have no ambition in work and am indifferent to success from within
Any person in any position and status is unimportant to me and I'm generally not affected by any position or status
I despise pretension, luxury and appearance-worship
Mysticism has often had a special feeling for me
I understand women and femininity with my whole being, as if I'm absorbed in them, and they always acknowledge this ability of mine
My relationship with my mother is very deep, intimate and loving and we both enjoy this relationship
During marital relationship I experience such deep emotions that I go into trance and forget everything
In sex I understand my partner's feeling very well and their satisfaction is very important to me and I have the ability to fulfill their complete satisfaction
I want to be committed in a permanent relationship with the opposite sex, but it's very hard for me
Despite getting along well with children and being attractive to them, I forget promises I make to my children
I have a feeling of being divine and special and think my life has a sacred meaning
Sometimes I feel emptiness and think there's nothing important in my life
At any age, even in middle age, I enjoy life and life is lovable to me and my loving is not dependent on anything
I've thought of suicide many times
